title: # 494 - Sonny Side & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with the host of the “Best Ever Food Review Show”, Sonny Side. We talk about creating our own content, moving to Korea, Vietnam, how he started his show, getting fired from Travel Channel, Nigeria, being a Host, and much more! 

 

Check out Sonny’s “Best Ever Food Review Show” here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcAd5Np7fO8SeejB1FVKcYw 

 

Follow Sonny here

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/besteverfoodreviewshow/?hl=en 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/SonnySided 

 

This episode is brought to you by SkyLight Frames. Get $10 off your purchase of a Skylight Frame when you go http://www.SkylightFrame.com and enter code “BERT” 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Candid. Get started for $15 at http://www.candidco.com/bert 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Zingeroo. Earn your bragging rights at apps.zingeroo.com/bertcast 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
